title: Trakt Wrapped
desc: Like Spotify Wrapped, but for Trakt.tv. Trakt Wrapped is a website that allows you to see your statistics on Trakt.tv. You can see your most watched movies, series, actors, directors, ...

title: HeroJS
desc: Hero.js is an Open Source project of Visual Novel game engine. The goal of this project is to allow you to create Visual Novels (from a simple Doki Doki to a RPG with fighting system), without coding. So what are you waiting for to start creating your stories?
